tags.name: ef-overlay
tags.description: Element to help building modals, dialogs and other overlay content

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: True if the overlay is currently displayed

attributes.name: with-shadow
attributes.description: True to add shadow

attributes.name: transparent
attributes.description: True to make overlay background transparent

attributes.name: spacing
attributes.description: True to apply spacing for overlay content

attributes.name: transition-style
attributes.description: Set the transition style

attributes.name: z-index
attributes.description: Set a preferable z-index to override automatically calculated z-index

attributes.name: x
attributes.description: Set a specific x coordinate

attributes.name: y
attributes.description: Set a specific y coordinate

attributes.name: position-target
attributes.description:
Set the position target as follows:
- HTMLElement if overlay is position next to the HTML element
- String containing `top`, `right`, `left`, `bottom`, `center` combinations to position against the screen.
For instance: `top left` - put the overlay at `top left` point of the screen; `bottom` - put overlay at `bottom center` point of the screen

attributes.name: horizontal-offset
attributes.description:
A pixel value that will be added to the position calculated on the horizontal axis.
The offset will be applied either to the `left` or `right` depending on the `positionTarget`

attributes.name: vertical-offset
attributes.description:
A pixel value that will be added to the position calculated on the vertical axis.
The offset will be applied either to the `top` or `bottom` depending on the `positionTarget`

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description:
A pixel value that will be added to the position calculated on the vertical or horizontal axis.
The offset is applied dynamically depending on the `positionTarget`

attributes.name: no-cancel-on-esc-key
attributes.description: Set to true to disable canceling the overlay with the ESC key

attributes.name: no-cancel-on-outside-click
attributes.description: Set to true to disable canceling the overlay by clicking outside it

attributes.name: full-screen
attributes.description: Set to true to show overlay in full screen mode

attributes.name: no-overlap
attributes.description: True to not overlap positionTarget

attributes.name: no-interaction-lock
attributes.description: Stop preventing user interaction when overlay is visible

attributes.name: no-focus-management
attributes.description:
True to not apply focus management.
The overlay will not limit Tab behaviour or do auto-focusing

attributes.name: lock-position-target
attributes.description:
True to lock position target
Valid only if noInteractionLock is false (default)

attributes.name: with-backdrop
attributes.description: True to show backdrop

attributes.name: no-autofocus
attributes.description: Set to true to disable autofocusing the overlay or open

attributes.name: position
attributes.description:
Set position and align against the attach target.
Position may contain a single word or a comma separated list to set the priority.
Position is not applied if `attachTarget` is not HTML Element.
For instance: `[bottom-middle, top-middle]` - default position is bottom-middle, if cannot fit position top-middle;
or `[left, right]` - align is not set, set best position on the left or right

Position can be: `top`, `right`, `bottom`, `left`, `center`
Align can be: `start`, `middle`, `end`

properties.name: opened
properties.description: True if the overlay is currently displayed

properties.name: withShadow
properties.description: True to add shadow

properties.name: transparent
properties.description: True to make overlay background transparent

properties.name: spacing
properties.description: True to apply spacing for overlay content

properties.name: transitionStyle
properties.description: Set the transition style

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Set a preferable z-index to override automatically calculated z-index

properties.name: x
properties.description: Set a specific x coordinate

properties.name: y
properties.description: Set a specific y coordinate

properties.name: positionTarget
properties.description:
Set the position target as follows:
- HTMLElement if overlay is position next to the HTML element
- String containing `top`, `right`, `left`, `bottom`, `center` combinations to position against the screen.
For instance: `top left` - put the overlay at `top left` point of the screen; `bottom` - put overlay at `bottom center` point of the screen

properties.name: horizontalOffset
properties.description:
A pixel value that will be added to the position calculated on the horizontal axis.
The offset will be applied either to the `left` or `right` depending on the `positionTarget`

properties.name: verticalOffset
properties.description:
A pixel value that will be added to the position calculated on the vertical axis.
The offset will be applied either to the `top` or `bottom` depending on the `positionTarget`

properties.name: offset
properties.description:
A pixel value that will be added to the position calculated on the vertical or horizontal axis.
The offset is applied dynamically depending on the `positionTarget`

properties.name: noCancelOnEscKey
properties.description: Set to true to disable canceling the overlay with the ESC key

properties.name: noCancelOnOutsideClick
properties.description: Set to true to disable canceling the overlay by clicking outside it

properties.name: fullScreen
properties.description: Set to true to show overlay in full screen mode

properties.name: noOverlap
properties.description: True to not overlap positionTarget

properties.name: noInteractionLock
properties.description: Stop preventing user interaction when overlay is visible

properties.name: noFocusManagement
properties.description:
True to not apply focus management.
The overlay will not limit Tab behaviour or do auto-focusing

properties.name: lockPositionTarget
properties.description:
True to lock position target
Valid only if noInteractionLock is false (default)

properties.name: interactiveElements
properties.description:
A list of elements, which are active when overlay is opened
Valid only if noInteractionLock is false (default)

properties.name: withBackdrop
properties.description: True to show backdrop

properties.name: noAutofocus
properties.description: Set to true to disable autofocusing the overlay or open

properties.name: position
properties.description:
Set position and align against the attach target.
Position may contain a single word or a comma separated list to set the priority.
Position is not applied if `attachTarget` is not HTML Element.
For instance: `[bottom-middle, top-middle]` - default position is bottom-middle, if cannot fit position top-middle;
or `[left, right]` - align is not set, set best position on the left or right

Position can be: `top`, `right`, `bottom`, `left`, `center`
Align can be: `start`, `middle`, `end`

properties.name: positionTargetConfig
properties.description:
Get position target configuration based on positionTarget and fullScreen properties
Used for caching and calculations

properties.name: focusBoundary
properties.description:
Set focus boundary to restrict tabbing. Default's overlay itself.
If external focus is required, set to null

properties.name: fullyOpened
properties.description:
Returns true if the overlay is opened and animation is not running.
Returns false if overlay is closed and animation is not running

properties.name: transitioning
properties.description: Returns true if overlay is doing opening or closing transition

events.name: closed
events.description: Dispatched when overlay becomes invisible and close animation finishes

events.name: opened
events.description: Dispatched when the overlay becomes visible and the open animation finishes

events.name: refit
events.description: Dispatched when refit algorithm finishes calculations

events.name: opened-changed
events.description: Dispatched when when open attribute changes internally. Prevent default to stop opening/closing pipeline

methods.name: clearCached
methods.description:
Clear all cached values.
Run when external changes occur to styles to re-calculate position.

methods.name: refit
methods.description:
Clear all cached values and fit the overlay.
Use this function if any of `maxWidth`, `maxHeight`, `minWidth`, `minHeight`, `height` or `width` changed

methods.name: toFront
methods.description: Move overlay to front of other overlays
